verses.verse: When <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2064>came<s%> a <S%G3015>leper<s%> and <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou <S%G2309>wilt,<s%> thou <S%G1410>canst<s%> make me <S%G2511>clean.<s%> <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> put <S%G1614>forth<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G2309>will;<s%> be thou clean. <S%G2511>And<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3014>leprosy<s%> was <S%G2511>cleansed.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> See <S%G3708><s%> thou <S%G2036>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>man;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> go thy <S%G5217>way,<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2409>priest,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1435>gift<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G4367>commanded,<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> unto them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> there <S%G4334>came<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G1543>centurion,<s%> <S%G3870>beseeching<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> <S%G906>lieth<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3614>home<s%> sick of the <S%G3885>palsy,<s%> <S%G1171>grievously<s%> <S%G928>tormented.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G2323>heal<s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G1543>centurion<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2425>worthy<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou shouldest <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4721>roof:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2036>speak<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> shall be <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G1510>a<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1849>authority,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G1683>me:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G5129>this<s%> man, <S%G4198>Go,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4198>goeth;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G243>another,<s%> <S%G2064>Come,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2064>cometh;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G4160>Do<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G4160>doeth<s%> it.

When <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, he <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them that <S%G190>followed,<s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> I have not <S%G2147>found<s%> so <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> no, <S%G3761>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G395>east<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1424>west,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall sit <S%G347>down<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> shall be cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1857>outer<s%> darkness: <S%G4655><s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2805>weeping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1543>centurion,<s%> Go thy <S%G5217>way;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> thou hast <S%G4100>believed,<s%> so be it <S%G1096>done<s%> unto thee. <S%G4671>And<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3816>servant<s%> was <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1565>selfsame<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4074>Peter's<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> wife's <S%G3994>mother<s%> <S%G906>laid,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sick of a <S%G4445>fever.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G680>touched<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she <S%G1453>arose,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that were possessed with <S%G1139>devils:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> with his <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that were <S%G2192>sick:<s%> <S%G2560><s%>

That <S%G3704><s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> which was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G769>infirmities,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G941>bare<s%> our <S%G3554>sicknesses.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he gave <S%G2753>commandment<s%> to <S%G565>depart<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> other <S%G4008>side.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> a <S%G1520>certain<s%> <S%G1122>scribe<s%> <S%G4334>came,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> I will <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G3699>whithersoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou <S%G565>goest.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G258>foxes<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5454>holes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4071>birds<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>air<s%> have <S%G2682>nests;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> to <S%G2827>lay<s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2010>suffer<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> to <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2290>bury<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>father.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> <S%G3427>me;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G863>let<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2290>bury<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> dead. <S%G3498><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G1684>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G4143>ship,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>tempest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea,<s%> insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship<s%> was <S%G2572>covered<s%> <S%G5259>with<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2949>waves:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2518>asleep.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to him and <S%G1453>awoke<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G2248>us:<s%> we <S%G622>perish.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> ye <S%G1169>fearful,<s%> O ye of little faith? <S%G3640><s%> <S%G5119>Then<s%> he <S%G1453>arose,<s%> and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1055>calm.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> What manner of <S%G4217>man<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G846>him!<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> other <S%G4008>side<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1086>Gergesenes,<s%> there <S%G5221>met<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> possessed with <S%G1139>devils,<s%> <S%G1831>coming<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3419>tombs,<s%> <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G5467>fierce,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2480>might<s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3598>way.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> they cried <S%G2896>out,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> What have we to do with <S%G5101>thee,<s%> <S%G2254><s%> <S%G4671><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> thou <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%> art thou <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5602>hither<s%> to <S%G928>torment<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G2540>time?<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a good way <S%G3112>off<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> an <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5519>swine<s%> <S%G1006>feeding.<s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1142>devils<s%> <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> thou cast us <S%G1544>out,<s%> <S%G2248><s%> <S%G2010>suffer<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> to go <S%G565>away<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Go. <S%G5217>And<s%> <S%G1161><s%> when they were come <S%G1831>out,<s%> they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine:<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G34>herd<s%> of <S%G5519>swine<s%> ran <S%G3729>violently<s%> <S%G2596>down<s%> a steep <S%G2911>place<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G599>perished<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5204>waters.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they that <S%G1006>kept<s%> them <S%G5343>fled,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went their <S%G565>ways<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G518>told<s%> every <S%G3956>thing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> what was <S%G3588>befallen<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> possessed of the <S%G1139>devils.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> came <S%G1831>out<s%> to <S%G1519>meet<s%> <S%G4877><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they <S%G3870>besought<s%> him <S%G3704>that<s%> he would <S%G3327>depart<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3725>coasts.<s%>
